title: 2 storied luxury house for sale in katuneriya
details:
650m from the main rd
furnished rooms
full hotter in 2 toilets and 1 servants toilet
2 kitchens one inside and one outside (both connected together
around 400m to the beach
very peaceful area
4 rooms available 2 downstairs and 2 upstairs
nice water fountain inside the house for children to play
